name: auvsisuas-client
description: Communication library for the AUVSI SUAS Interoperability Server

scripts.test-only: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --all --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha --require source-map-support/register
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib --source-maps inline
scripts.build-no-map: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib

author: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Team | The University of Texas at Austin
